text.0: agni bestows the fleet prizewinning courser agni the hero famed and firm in duty.
text.1: agni pervades and decks the earth and heaven and fills the fruitful dame who teems with heroes.
text.2: blest be the wood that feeds the active agni within the two great worlds hath agni entered.
text.3: agni impels a single man to battle and with him rends in pieces many a foeman.
text.4: agni rejoiced the car of him who praised lim and from the waters burnt away jarutha.
text.5: agni saved atri in the fiery cavem and made nrmedha rich with troops of children.
text.6: agni hath granted wealth that decks the hero and sent the sage who wins a thousand cattle.
text.7: agni hath made oblations rise to heaven to every place are agnis laws extended.
text.8: with songs of praise the Ṛṣis call on agni on agni heroes worsted in the foray.
text.9: birds flying in the region call on agni around a thousand cattle agni wanders.
text.10: races of human birth pay agni worship men who have sprung from nahus line adore him.
text.11: stablished in holy oil is agnis pasture on the gandharva path of law and order.
text.12: the Ṛbhus fabricated prayer for agni and we with mighty hymns have called on agni.
text.13: agni most youthful god protect the singer win us by worship agni great possessions.
